## XForm.worldToThis() method

Transform world coordinate to local space

**Signature:**

```typescript
worldToThis(v: Vector3, result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | point or vector in world space |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output result |

**Returns:**

[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)

The transformed local space coordinate
